name: Amr Mohammed
summary: Enthusiastic and quick-learning aspiring ML Engineer. Eager to apply knowledge of machine learning techniques and tools like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn to real-world projects. Passionate about contributing to innovative solutions in recommendation systems, computer vision, and LLM-powered applications.

skills.technologies: Flask, GitHub API, Gemini API, PySpark

experience.title: AI Internship
experience.responsibilities:
Developed machine learning models for regression, classification, and recommendation tasks using datasets from Kaggle and UCI.
Applied deep learning techniques with TensorFlow and Keras, focusing on model evaluation and tuning for deployment readiness.

education.achievements:
Maintained a strong academic record with a cumulative grade of B and GP of A.
Completed relevant coursework including Introduction to Machine Learning, Data Science, and Neural Networks.

projects.name: AI-Powered Resume Builder
projects.description:
Developing a full-stack web app to transform resumes into ATS-compliant CVs using the Gemini LLM API and NLP.
Building a real-time content editor with PDF export, leveraging Flask and PyMuPDF.

projects.name: Local Product Finder (GP)
projects.description:
Created a mobile app that identifies products from images using MobileNet with 99% accuracy.
Built a hybrid recommendation system combining content-based and collaborative filtering to suggest local alternatives.

projects.name: AlphaLearn Game
projects.description:
Developed a Unity game where difficulty adapts to player performance using reinforcement learning.
Integrated an ONNX model that adjusts game speed and obstacles in real-time based on player score.

projects.name: car-price-prediction
projects.description: A machine learning project that predicts the price of a car using linear regression.

projects.name: ml-from-scratch
projects.description: Implementation of core machine learning algorithms from scratch using Python and NumPy — for learning, intuition, and mastery.

certificates.name: Mathematics for Machine Learning
certificates.description: Applied linear algebra, calculus, and probability concepts to machine learning.

certificates.name: CS50’s Introduction to Artificial Intelligence with Python
certificates.description: Studied search algorithms, logic, probability, and machine learning.

certificates.name: CS50: Introduction to Computer Science
certificates.description: Learned programming fundamentals using C and Python.
